--- In junit@y..., "Anshuman" <amoni@v...> wrote:
> Hi !,
> 
>     In JDK 1.4.0 Beta 2 verion, assert is a keyword. Has any one 
looked into this ? Is there any proposed changes for the JUnit assert 
method ? How will a code for the unit testing written using JUnit be 
compatible with the JDK1.4 version ? 
> 

There are several posts here that discuss this.
I haven't tried JDK 1.4 myself yet but I understand
that you should use assertTrue method instead of assert
in JUnit. assert has been deprecated because of this.

Kaarle

> 
> -ASM
